Title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
Writer: Jane Goldman, Matthew Vaughn, Mark Millar (based on the comic book "The Secret Service" by), Dave Gibbons (based on the comic book "The Secret Service" by)
Actors: Taron Egerton, Edward Holcroft, Gordon Alexander, Mark Strong
Plot: When the Kingsman headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, their journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the US called Statesman, dating back to the day they were both founded. In a new adventure that tests their agents' strength and wits to the limit, these two elite secret organizations band together to defeat a ruthless common enemy, in order to save the world, something that's becoming a bit of a habit for Eggsy...
